griffon.plugins.tasks.TaskListener

  • Packages that use TaskListener 
    Package Description
    griffon.plugins.tasks

    • Uses of TaskListener in griffon.plugins.tasks

      Methods in griffon.plugins.tasks with parameters of type TaskListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskListenerSupport.addListener(String taskId, TaskListener listener)
      Add a TaskListener that will only receive events for tasks with the specified id.
      void TaskContext.addListener(TaskListener listener)
      Adds listener that receives events for this execution only.
      void TaskListenerSupport.addListener(TaskListener listener)
      Add a TaskListener that receives events for all tasks executed.
      void TaskListenerSupport.removeListener(String taskId, TaskListener listener) 
      void TaskContext.removeListener(TaskListener listener) 
      void TaskListenerSupport.removeListener(TaskListener listener)
